### Automated Permit Machine System – Lake Louise, AB

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Details

Reference Number: PW-23-01025922
Solicitation Number: 5P420-22-0201/A
Publication Date: February 14, 2023
Tender Closing Date and Time: March 22, 2023, at 4:00 PM MST
[Current Tender Status: Excerpted from original text.]

#### Notice Type and Method of Procurement

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Competitive procurement by open bidding

#### Project Description and Scope

Parks Canada requires the provision of services for the Automated Permit Machine System in Lake Louise, Alberta. The successful Contractor will be responsible for supplying, installing, operating, and maintaining semi-seasonal automated permit machines at designated locations within the Lake Louise, Yoho, and Kootenay Field Unit. The Contractor will also be required to provide a Central Management System to support the machines and a real-time web-based enforcement application available on mobile devices.

#### Requirements

* Provision of 13 automated permit machines to be installed at the following locations:
	+ Lake Louise Visitor Centre, Alberta
	+ Yoho National Park Visitor Centre, Field, BC
	+ Upper Lake Louise Parking Lot, Lake Louise, Alberta (11 machines, including one for wheelchair accessibility)
* Associated Central Management System to support the machines
* Real-time web-based enforcement application available on mobile devices
* Capability to issue various national park admission passes and parking permits (Upper Lake Louise)

#### Period of Contract and Delivery Date

* Contract duration: from the contract start date to March 31, 2024
* Option for two (2) additional one (1) year extensions, up to March 31, 2026
